color.title: Background color
color.description: This sets the base background color to use throughout the UI like, tree-view, tab-bar, panels, panes and views.

value.title: Background darkness/lightness
value.description: This darkens or lightens the background color. Set negative numbers to darken and positive numbers to lighten. Range is -100 through 100

navvalue.title: Tree-view and Tab-bar darkness/lightness
navvalue.description: This darkens or lightens the tree-view, tab-bar, find-and-replace panel and popup modal backgrounds. Set negative numbers to darken and positive numbers to lighten. Range is -100 through 100

color.title: Text color
color.description: This sets the base color for text throughout the UI

value.title: Text darkness/lightness
value.description: This darkens or lightens the text color. Set negative numbers to darken and positive numbers to lighten. Range is -100 through 100

color.title: Heading color
color.description: This styles all headings throughout the UI

value.title: Heading darkness/lightness
value.description: This darkens or lightens the heading color. Set negative numbers to darken and positive numbers to lighten. Range is -100 through 100

color.title: Backgound and link text color
color.description: This is the color applied to bottons and text links.

value.title: Backgound and link text darkness/lightness
value.description: This darkens or lightens the button color. Set negative numbers to darken and positive numbers to lighten. Range is -100 through 100

textcolor.title: Button text color
textcolor.description: Set the button text color to either the main text color or the main background color.

value.title: Border darkness/lightness
value.description: This darkens or lightens borders around elements. Set negative numbers to darken and positive numbers to lighten. Range is -100 through 100

radius.title: Border radius
radius.description: Set border radius on buttons, inputs and containers. 0-20

borderHighLightColor.title: Border highlight color
borderHighLightColor.description: This sets the border of the rectangle that appears around search terms. Just do a seach real quick to see what I'm talking about.

borderHighLightColorCurrent.title: Border highlight color - current selected term
borderHighLightColorCurrent.description: This sets the border of the rectangle of the currently selected search terms. Just do a seach real quick to see what I'm talking about.

background.title: Background style
background.description: This styles the background on all settings pages. *Pinstripe looks best on Retina screens.

nav.title: Menu vertical/horizontal
nav.description: This switches between a vertical and horizontal menu settings nav
